title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 380-10.1 - Additional requirements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 380-10.1 - Additional requirements

State Regulations

The Department may, by rule, regulation, or order, impose
upon any person subject to this Part such requirements in addition to those
established in this Part as it deems appropriate or necessary to protect public
health and safety or the environment from the disposal or release of
radioactive material to the environment. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
380-10.1

Amended

New

York State Register April 25, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 17, eff. 5/10/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
